trans-unit.source: Contains security-related properties and is attached to a message.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper for sikkerhetsrelatert og er knyttet til en melding.

trans-unit.source: Client authentication results are translated into an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>, which is attached to the message using a SecurityMessageProperty.
trans-unit.target: Klienten godkjenning resultater oversettes til en forekomst av <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>, som er knyttet til meldingen ved hjelp av en SecurityMessageProperty.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used by higher layers to implement custom authorization logic.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes av høyere lag for å implementere egendefinerte godkjenning logic.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Clones the current instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Kloner den gjeldende forekomsten av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: To access any objects in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty>, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.TransportToken%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.IncomingSupportingTokens%2A>), a copy must be created because these properties are undefined after the message is disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Til objekter i den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty>, slik som <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.ServiceSecurityContext%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.TransportToken%2A>, eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.IncomingSupportingTokens%2A>), må opprettes en kopi fordi disse egenskapene er angitt når meldingen selges.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.IncomingSupportingTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.TransportToken%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.ServiceSecurityContext%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty> cloned from the current instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty>klonede fra den gjeldende forekomsten av denne klassen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty>

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the current instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Disposes for den gjeldende forekomsten av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of external authorization policies.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling av ekstern godkjenning policyer.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A> is called on these authorization policies as part of the process that creates the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>kalles på policyene godkjenning som en del av prosessen som oppretter <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or creates an instance of this class from the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller oppretter en forekomst av denne klassen fra den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the incoming message contains at least one supporting security token.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den innkommende meldingen inneholder minst én støttet sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the principal tokens for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Støttet tokener angi ytterligere krav utover de som finnes i principal-token for bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens can be scoped at a different scope than the binding.
trans-unit.target: Kan område støtter tokener på et annet område enn bindingen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.IncomingSupportingTokens*> contains at least one entry; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.IncomingSupportingTokens*>inneholder minst én oppføring; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityMessageProperty.IncomingSupportingTokens*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of incoming supporting tokens.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling av innkommende støttet tokener.

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the principal tokens for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Støttet tokener angi ytterligere krav utover de som finnes i principal-token for bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens can be scoped at a different scope than the binding.
trans-unit.target: Kan område støtter tokener på et annet område enn bindingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SupportingTokenSpecification"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> av typen <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SupportingTokenSpecification"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> initiator token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> oppretter tokenet for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: If the message pattern requires multiple messages, the Initiator Token is used for the message signature from initiator to the recipient, and for encryption from recipient to initiator.
trans-unit.target: Hvis meldingen mønsteret krever flere meldinger, er oppretter-Token brukt for meldingssignatur fra oppretter til mottakeren og kryptering fra mottaker til oppretter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> initiator token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> oppretter tokenet for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of outgoing <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SupportingTokenSpecification"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av utgående <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SupportingTokenSpecification"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: A collection of outgoing supporting tokens.
trans-unit.target: En samling av utgående støttet tokener.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> protection token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> beskyttelse tokenet for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Protection Tokens are used in symmetric security bindings for signing and encryption.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttelse token er brukt i symmetrisk sikkerhet bindinger for signering og kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> protection token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> beskyttelse tokenet for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> recipient token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> mottakeren tokenet for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: If the message pattern requires multiple messages, the Recipient Token is used for encryption from initiator to recipient, and for the message signature from recipient to initiator.
trans-unit.target: Hvis meldingen mønsteret krever flere meldinger, er mottaker-Token brukt for kryptering fra oppretter til mottakeren og meldingssignatur fra mottaker til oppretter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> recipient token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> mottakeren tokenet for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sender ID prefix for this message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avsenderen ID-prefiks for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The sender ID prefix for this message.
trans-unit.target: Avsender-ID-prefiks for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No character of the property value is alphabetic, numeric, or equal to "_", ".", or "-".
trans-unit.target: Ingen tegn på egenskapsverdien er alfabetiske numeriske eller lik "_", ".", eller "-".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext"></xref> for this message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext"> </xref> for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to obtain information about the runtime security context.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne klassen for å få informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst kjøring.

trans-unit.source: A security context is created when a client is successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: En sikkerhetskontekst opprettes når en klient er godkjent.

trans-unit.source: The security information from the client and for the current service instance can be obtained from an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsinformasjonen fra klienten og for gjeldende tjenesteforekomsten kan hentes fra en forekomst av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: A common use of the class is to retrieve the current set of claims for the purpose of authorizing a client when accessing a method.
trans-unit.target: Vanlig bruk av klassen er å vise den oppdaterte krav for å gi en klient under tilgang til en annen metode.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext"></xref> object for this message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceSecurityContext"> </xref> objekt for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> transport token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> transport tokenet for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A Transport Token provides security at the transport level.
trans-unit.target: Transport av Token gir sikkerhet på transportnivå.

trans-unit.source: A token used by HTTPS is an example of a Transport Token.
trans-unit.target: Et token som brukes av HTTPS er et eksempel på en Transport-Token.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"></xref> transport token for this message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification"> </xref> transport tokenet for meldingen.
